---
category: news
title: "Machine learning estimation of tissue optical properties"
excerpt: "Dynamic, in vivo measurement of the optical properties of biological tissues is still an elusive and critically important problem. Here we develop a technique for inverting a Monte Carlo simulation to extract tissue optical properties from the statistical moments of the spatio-temporal response of the tissue by training a 5-layer fully connected neural network."
publishedDateTime: 2021-03-22T10:57:00Z
originalUrl: "https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-021-85994-w"
webUrl: "https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-021-85994-w"
